name: Crimson Heart Wanderer
author: Yuewen Manhua &#40阅文漫画&#41
content: Jiang Wang was betrayed by his sworn brother Fang Pengju, who stole the Daoist Academy&#039s reward of a Meridian Opening pill that he had earned with his blood and sweat. On the verge of death, he inherited the relics of Zuo Guanglie, the genius of the Chu Dynasty, opened his meridians and embarked on the path of cultivation. He was confused and hesitant, but he always held on to the light in his heart, which was a pure heart that remained true to its original intention.
